name: Local One Day Photography
description: Capture a milestone or an important life event to make the moment last.

name: Product Photography
description: Product photography, or e-commerce photography as it's sometimes known, is basically what it sounds like: photos taken and used on websites and social media platforms to help drive sales of your product or service.

name: Food photography
description: Network Design. Network Device Installation. Newtork Maintance.

name: Videography and Travel Filmmaking
description: Creating films and being called a filmmaker and content creator was my biggest dream. I have been working as a photographer, cinematographer, and editor. Moreover, I create content for social media and YouTube. I do professionavoice-overs and scriptwriting for my projects. Translations, video editing, and cinematography are included in my everyday task.

name: cinematic Headshot
description: You will get a beautiful/cinematic edited portrait for your business profile or career. I shoot in NY/NJ area up to 60 miles.

name: lifestyle photography campaign
description: I am a New York based commercial photographer with more than 10 years of international expertise in lifestyle & fashion. My work was featured in various global exhibitions and well-known magazines (such as New York Post, Business Insider, Vogue Italia, etc.). I am passionate about my work and had the opportunity to work with many brand names to include: Vodafone, Axe, Panasonic, Nissan, Nescafe, Tag Heuer, Piaget, Chevrolet, L`Oreal, Montblanc, and many more.
